text.sentence: Julian, The "Confirmation" will be the actual written Confirmation, which confirms in writing the terms of the deal agreed to on the phone.

I don't know if what they're looking for is a form of Confirmation (not deal specific) of what a Confirmation might look like if they did a trade, or if you actually have done or are proposing a particular trade and need to see the Confirmation filled in with the proposed deal terms.
I left Roni Cappadonna with Duke a voicemail asking her which specifically she was looking for.
As soon as I hear from her I'll get her what she needs.
If you have any more questions, email me back, or call.
